TopicTitle: Am I being Verbose, anyways I need ISA Help

Articles.Content:
Ok, I've been using the forum alot, and there is a lot of nice people able to help me.

Anyways, I've installed ISA MapSat, and I would like to know how to use it.

I've put the Plugin files in the Plugins folder, and I put the PluginData files in the plugin Data folder, and parts in the parts folder,

i've put a shortcut to the ISA Application on my desktop and was wondering how to start the map function

the part 'dish' can be found in aero parts folder

put that onto your ship, head to orbit. polar orbit is nice

activate the part found on the bottom left of your screen

50x time compression is the max the map will scan, faster and it will not scan

orbit until u have the coverage you wish

found this might help some

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/ISA_MapSat

also found this video

Edited May 18, 2013 by miketheveeg
more info
ok thanks, SEE this is what i mean by there are nice people who lead to all sorts of information
